original_text: I will give all your valuable things to your enemies. They will take them all away. You will receive nothing in return. That will pay for the sins that you have done everywhere in your land. I will give all your valuable things to your enemies.
korean_text: 그러나 네 모든 죄로 말미암아 네 국경 안의 모든 재산과 보물로 값 없이 탈취를 당하게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will give all your valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너의 모든 귀중한 것들을 주겠다

sentences.original_text: They will take them all away
You will receive nothing in return
That will pay for the sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 죄에 대한 대가가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will give all your valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너의 모든 귀중한 것들을 주겠다
